heading: Today
text: Morning rain west, showers east, then showers north this afternoon.  Becoming windy.

heading: Friday Night
text: Windy. Showers ending south, changing to snow over higher terrain north.

heading: Saturday
text: Scattered valley rain and mountain snow showers, mainly north.
temperature: Upper 30s to upper 40s north to south

heading: Sunday
text: Sunny south. Morning clouds north, more afternoon sun.
